page.title: 19LOCHGOILHEAD-ECONOMICS
page.content: People in Lochgoilhead have to carefully budget their weekly accounts as their is no permanent bank in the village.The Royal Bank of Scotland comes every Thursday, weather permitting. The bank is held in the Village Hall from 10.00-12.30 and 13.30-15.00. The only other financial institution is the Post Office which is run by Mr.Paterson.He is known as Jimmy the Cannuck because he spent some time in Canada. The general economics of the village are very closely bound to the tourist industry. A bad tourist season has an adverse effect on many people in the village.
